means: 考虑( consider的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: The empirical evidence considered here is subject to many qualifications.
sentence.Network_cn: 此处提及的实验证据有诸多限制条件。

sentence.Network_en: The landlord refused to serve him because he considered him too drunk.
sentence.Network_cn: 酒吧老板觉得他已经喝多了，拒绝再给他添酒。

sentence.Network_en: Any entry arriving after the closing date will not be considered.
sentence.Network_cn: 截止日期之后报名参赛的人将不予考虑。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... restreicted 受限制的 considered 考虑过的 closed 关闭了的.
two people considered as a unit ., 两个人被认为是一个整体.
《Friends》词汇表A ... lambs n. 小羊, 羔羊v.生小羊 considered adj. 考虑过的, 被尊重的 admit v. 容许, 承认, 接纳.
the Malaysian culture , only the gods are considered capable of producing anything perfect ., 在马来西亚文化中 , 人们认为只有神才能做到尽善尽美.

list.abs: made at what I consider a most opportune moment ., 是在我认为最恰当的时刻提出来的.
人教版高中英语单词表(第一册上必修) - 豆丁网 ... suggest vt. 建议； 提议 consider doing sth 考虑做某事 weigh vt. 称…的重量.
英语选修8单词表_百度知道 ... 83. be considered as 被认为是 84. consider doing sth. 考虑做…… 85. be covered with 被……覆盖.
would you consider yourself an exhibitionist ., 你认为自己出风头.
说一下when和while... ... Whereas;although: 虽然，尽管： Considering that;if: 考虑到，如果： What or which time: 什么时候：.

entry.tran: 经过慎重思考的;经过深思熟虑的
entry.def: A considered opinion or act is the result of careful thought.

example.ex: Obviously it was Anne's considered opinion that Mavis was a bold-faced liar...
example.tran: 安妮认为梅维斯是个厚颜无耻的骗子，这显然是经过一番深思熟虑后才得出的看法。

example.ex: We would hope to be able to give a considered response to the unions' proposals by the end of the year.
example.tran: 对于工会的提议，我们希望能在年底之前给出一个成熟的答复。

auth_sentence.content: The settlements are considered illegal by the international community.
auth_sentence.res_content: The settlements are considered illegal by the international community.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The settlements are considered illegal by the international community.

auth_sentence.content: He revealed he had considered withdrawing from the event.
auth_sentence.res_content: He revealed he had considered withdrawing from the event.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He revealed he had considered withdrawing from the event.

auth_sentence.content: No entries received after that time will be considered.
auth_sentence.res_content: No entries received after that time will be considered.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No entries received after that time will be considered.

Sentence.sentence: Authors still published in printed versions will be considered important ones.
Students' racial background should be considered before lodging is assigned.
Money is considered to be the root of all evils
Investors will invest in a bond considered risky only if the potential return is high enough.
Both Martin Luther King and John Kennedy appealed to the idea that humans can transcend what were once considered inherent limitations.

Teenagers in Australia, similarly ,said that their mobile phones provided numerous benefits and were an affiliated part of their lives; some were so attached to their phones that the researchers considered it an addiction

means.word_mean: 经过仔细考虑的, 经过深思熟虑的

sentences.en: It is my considered opinion that we can’t afford to do it.
sentences.cn: 我们承担不了这事, 这是我经过深思熟虑的意见。

means.word_mean: 受尊敬的, 受尊重的, 受推崇的

sentences.en: Her paintings are well considered abroad.
sentences.cn: 她的画在国外得到很好的评价。

sentences.en: In my considered opinion, ‘Trainspotting’ is one of the best British movies ever made.
sentences.cn: 仔细想来，我认为《猜火车》是英国最好的电影之一。
